definition: Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS
wick of an oil lamp/to burn (incense etc)/classifier for lit incense sticks

sentences.english: A moxa cone placed directly on the point and ignited is called direct moxibustion.
sentences.chinese: 是將艾炷直接放在穴位皮膚上施灸的一種方法。

sentences.english: Theintensities of the two stimulations given by the burning of the moxas are different.
sentences.chinese: 治療艾炷和安慰艾炷在燃燒時的刺激強度是不同的。

sentences.english: Theintensities of the two stimulations given by the burning of the moxas are different.
sentences.chinese: 治療艾炷和安慰艾炷在燃燒時的刺激強度是不同的。

sentences.english: Placebo and treatment moxibustion pillars were made by affixinga moxa cone onto a special collar base.
sentences.chinese: 製作方法將艾粒粘在特殊製作的底託上做成艾炷。

definition: to leave an inserted needle in place for a period of time (acupuncture)
fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
to smear/to apply glue or ointment to a surface
